metadata.name: Kura
metadata.description:
In the northern part of Nigeria, we have different numbers of cultures and traditions. One of the most common festival is the Durbar festival which started in the 1400s which sole aim is to preserve African culture and tradition. It is a four (4) days event where people gets to foster love, peace and unity.

 In the picture  above is a fearless man whose talents makes him superior to others whereby he can not get cut by knife, many of this type of human attends this festival to display their talent.
